content.rendered:
Join us at Cavalli Pizza in Adriatica Village for BINGO!

Tuesday, September 12th 3:30-5:30 pm.

Cavalli Pizza Napoletana

6851 Virgnia Pkwy., McKinney, TX 75071.

Please RSVP to Melanie Chaiken at mchaiken@allegiancetitle.com
